description: Fearful of the risk from radicalised offenders, European countries plays a delicate balancing act.
title: How Europe deals with terror offenders when they are freed from jail
title_page: How Europe deals with terror offenders when they are freed from jail - BBC News
maintext: First it is difficult to evaluate their success scientifically because legal, ethical and security concerns place restrictions on doing so. But also many of these programmes are in their infancy, so no proper case studies or data exist and there is no consensus on what constitutes best practice.
